scripts.test: docker compose -f "test/docker/docker-compose.yml" -f "test/docker/docker-compose.override.yml" -p dockercomposelooplexsampleswebapitest up -d && echo "Waiting 30s for the container to up..." && sleep 30 && docker exec -it sample-api-dotnet-db-test bash -c "/db-migration.sh" && dotnet test && docker-compose -p dockercomposelooplexsampleswebapitest down && docker volume rm dockercomposelooplexsampleswebapitest_dbdata-test
